metadata.title: Earthquake jolts Zhob, Kalat and surrounding areas

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, May 14 (APP): A 4.4 magnitude earthquake hit Zhob and the surrounding areas of Balochistan on Wednesday. According to a private news channel and the Seismological Center, Kalat also experienced a 3.9 magnitude tremor. The epicentre was located 15 kilometers north of Kalat at a shallow depth of 12 kilometers. Residents rushed out of their homes in fear as the tremors were felt.
